=Release Notes Android Application=
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.14 Milestone-Release1.1.14]===
 * Enhancement:
  * Account - Change Password (issue 210)
 * Bugs:
  * Logout crashes because user is deleted to early (issue 211)
  * pplication Reset crashes when not logged in (issue 212)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.13 Milestone-Release1.1.13]===
 * Bugs
  * Splitting ongoing TR from notification makes two ongoing TR's (when gap is 0 minutes) (Issue 185)
  * 'Punch out and start next' not working from notification (issue 186)
  * Screen rotation will recreate activity (issue 202)
  * Notifcation for ongoing time registration is not shown in the ongoing-notifications area (issue 207)
 * Enhancement:
  * WorkTime 2x2 Widget on LockScreen (issue 159)
  * Nice TR list entires (issue 197)
  * Enable project and task creation from selection dialogs (issue 206)
 * New Feature:
  * Add Accounts in Preferences (Issue 155)
  * WorkTime Login (issue 156)
  * WorkTime Registration (issue 157)
  * WorkTime Profile (issue 158)
  * Account Sync Options (issue 176)
  * Manual Synchronization (issue 180)
  * Automated Synchronization (issue 181)
  * View full synchronization history (issue 188)
  * Keep number of synced projects, tasks,... (issue 189)
  * Add option to not automatically sync (issue 194)
  * Add option to retry syncing every 5 minutes if sync failed (issue 203)
  * Add preference to choose which account sync error to show (issue 204)
  * Add showcase when first running the app to explain some features (issue 205)
  * Add a donation feature (issue 208)

 * Bugs
  * Jelly Bean notification does not get updated (issue 136)

===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.6 Milestone-Release1.1.6]===
 * Bugs:
  * User cannot open the time registration action screen (issue 126)
  * Disable auto-database backup (issue 127)
  * Application crash on Honeycomb (issue 131)
 * Enhancements:
  * Disable non critical logging in market releases (issue 125)
  * Enhance the notifications for Android Jelly Bean (issue 124)
  * Mini widgets per project and task (issue 60)
  * Add notification for successful/failed backup and restore (issue 128)
  * Customizable back/restore location (issue 129)
 * New features:
  * Chaining time registrations (issue 20)
  * Add preference option for default TR-actions (issue 130)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.5 Milestone-Release1.1.5]===
 * Bugs
 * New Features:
  * New punch-out dialog (also for edit time registration) (issue 111)
  * Reset application (time registrations, projects and tasks) (issue 115)
  * Remove time registrations in a certain range (issue 116)
 * Enhancements:
  * Honeycomb (3.x) and ICS (4.x) support (issue 68)

  * Add option to go to reporting from task (with criteria filled in) (issue 120)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.4 Milestone-Release1.1.4]===
 * Bugs:
  * "Auto close 60s gap" is not working correctly (issue 104)
  * Starting a time registration wants to set the notification (in the status bar) multiple times (issue 105)
  * Dashboard does not display punch-bar although the preference is enabled (issue 108)
  * Cannot export reports on 2.1 devices (issue 110)
 * New Features:
  * Backup scheduling (issue 55)
  * Backup preferences (issue 75)
  * Add export to Excel for reports (issue 107)
  * Make punch-bar clickable for ongoing time registrations (issue 109)
 * Enhancements:
  * Add extra predefined date ranges in reporting module (issue 103)
  * Split Time Registration default value for start of second TR can be better (issue 106)
  * Reset preferences to defaults (issue 114)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.3 Milestone-Release1.1.3] (Projects, Tasks and Time Registrations)===
 * Bugs:
  * Backup/Restore bug (issue 82)
  * Backup files and exports are not accessible from my computer (ICS) (issue 84)
  * Crash when running report for "last week" (issue 91)
  * List of time registration (or detail for ongoing TR) is not updated on punch in/out (issue 93)
  * "Restart time registration" available on TR details for ongoing time registration (issue 95)
  * Export file is not UTF-8 and misses BOM (screws up Russian and Hebrew export files) (issue 100)
  * Timeregistration comment gone when ending TR with setting "Ask for comment?" disabled (issue 102)
 * Enhancements:
  * Punch in/out from app instead of widget-only (issue 59)
  * Show/Hide switch for "finished tasks" in the project details (issue 66)
  * Change preferences for tasks (issue 80)
  * Mark projects finished (issue 81)
  * Review preferences system (issue 83)
  * Send backup files through mail (issue 94)
  * ICS (Android 4.x) Optimization for menu-button and widget (issue 96)
  * Add widget preview (issue 97)
  * Copy a project and all of it's tasks (issue 99)
  * Display the split-gap when splitting time registrations (issue 101)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.2&can=1 Milestone-Release1.1.2] (Time Registrations)===
 * 1.1.2.f
  * Bugs:
   * Crash when updating a task and no time registrations registered yet (issue 89)
   * Disable backup/restore (issue 90)
  * Enhancements:
   * Multi-line input for time registration comments (issue 49)
 * 1.1.2.e
  * Bugs:
   * Crash when deleting a task when no time registration yet (issue 87)
  * Enhancements:
   * Date precision preference for time registrations (seconds or minutes) (issue 62)
 * 1.1.2.d
  * Enhancements:
   * Move task to other project (issue 69)
 * 1.1.2.c
  * Enhancements:
   * Splitting time registrations (issue 23)
   * Add comment to unfinished time registration (issue 72)
   * Honeycomb and Ice Cream Sandwich support (no tablet!) (issue 86)
 * 1.1.2.b
  * Bugs:
   * Time Registration startDate >= previous endDate (issue 61)
   * ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException (issue 79)
  * Enhancements:
   * Error messages when editing time registration start/end times should be simplified (issue 33)
 * 1.1.2.a
  * Enhancements:
   * Remove 'delete' button in list of time registrations (issue 73)
   * Dynamically load time registration to make it more light weight (issue 77)
===[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.1&can=1 Milestone-Release1.1.1] (Reporting and widgets-usability)===
 * Enhancements:

   * Default reporting to generate reports and export to a CSV file (issue 25)
   * Project details: total work time (issue 4)
   * Send report file by e-mail (issue 57)
   * Share multiple generated WorkTime reports (issue 76)
  * Don't ask for the task (if only one task) at check-in from the widget (issue 58)
  * Deprecate export in time registrations module (replace by reporting module link) (issue 65)
 * Tasks:
  * Release the sources... (issue 64)
  * Apply the Apache License 2.0 (issue 63)
==[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release1.1.0&can=1 Milestone-Release1.1.0] (Backup and Restore)==

==[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release1.0.1&can=1 Milestone-Release1.0.1]==
 * Bugfixes for Milestone-Release1.0.0:
  * Project/Task-name not updated in widget and notification (issue 24)
  * Disable notifications through the preferences (issue 27)
  * 12-24h preference(issue 3)
  * Inconsistent usage of time picker (12-24h mode) (issue 29)
  * 'View details' for time registration available from time registration detail view (issue 32)
  * Export not comma separated (issue 52)
  * Using export separator in comment gives bad display in spreadsheet app (issue 52)
 * Enhancements:
  * Marking tasks as finished (issue 28)
  * Launch app from notification (issue 30)
  * Change start/stop on widget to 'punch in'/'punch out' (issue 36)
  * Google Analytics tracking (issue 34)
  * Delete time registration from registration overview context menu (issue 37)
  * Restart a time registration when accidentally closed (issue 45)
  * Keyboard in uppercase state by default (issue 43)
==[http://code.google.com/p/worktime/issues/list?q=label:Milestone-Release1.0.0&can=1 Milestone-Release1.0.0]==
Initial release of the application including the basic features:
 * Manage Projects
 * Manage Tasks
 * Manage Time Registrations
 * Widget
 * Add Time Registrations through the widget
 * Basic export functionality to CSV
